overview: xxd is a command-line utility that is part of the Vim text editor package and is used for creating or examining binary, hexadecimal, and octal dumps of files or text input. xxd provides a convenient way to analyze file contents, extract binary data, and convert between different data representations.
core_features: Creating hexadecimal, binary, or octal dumps of files
Converting binary data to human-readable formats
Analyzing file contents and data structures
Support for examining and editing binary files
